explanations.machine learning: The paper develops a novel end-to-end graph neural network model for asset pricing, which is a machine learning technique.
explanations.neural network: The paper proposes a graph neural network model, which is a type of neural network.
explanations.deep learning: The model combines graph attention mechanism and recurrent convolutional neural network, which are deep learning techniques.
explanations.representation learning: The model learns dynamic network structures and diffuses firms' information, which involves learning representations of the data.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper uses a recurrent convolutional neural network to diffuse and propagate firms' information.
explanations.CNN: CNN is mentioned as part of the model architecture.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The model includes a recurrent convolutional neural network, which is a type of recurrent neural network.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper applies the graph attention mechanism to learn dynamic network structures.
